attributes.action: Major school incident fixed body to be set up
attributes.additional_details: Every School - incident body should be set up to include ofsted, local councillor, MP, police, plus fixed members from the PTA (In incident - the particular deputy head, clearly pointing out to her that those who carried out the unprovoked attack were on the CCTV cameras who I was dealing with and the police, was then distanced  and not involved in any of the meetings, the head of the school departed shortly after responding in letter to the local MP, the chair of governors even though came in every day to pick up the post, did not attend any of the meetings, has now also left) - Parents have the right to know if any pupil has a violent police record. School should hand over CCTV without the police having to fill in any forms.
